entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intrinsics parity with x64 for Arm64 #70533
    7.0.0
  • Enable platform agnostic SIMD support for vector #70532
    7.0.0
  • Enable multi-register intrinsics for Arm64 #70531
    7.0.0
  • Throughput for Server workloads on ARM64 is comparable to x64 #70530
    7.0.0
  • [Arm64 Server Throughput] Address many-core scaling challenges #70528
    7.0.0
  • Arm64v8 ISA optimization, both in the JIT and where runtime and libraries have significant x64 optimizations #70527
    7.0.0
  • FileInfo somehow trims the path passed in when it should not #70524
  • [API Proposal]: Add APIs to `System.IO.Compression` that can compressed `tar` archives like `tar.gz` #70517
  • Tar entries should be able to handle paths that begin with "\.", including the root path itself #70516
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Throw helpers should return the valid value back #70515
  • Improving build and test pass rate #70510
    Future
  • Unable to run dotnet-ilverify on Apple M1 #70508
    7.0.0
  • IServiceCollection Contains not finding ServiceDescriptor #70505
  • [Mono] Revisit the signedness of the index argument of metadata methods #70495
  • [mono] Runtime tests failing with 'Attempting to JIT compile method' for Mono FullAOT mode #70492
    Future
  • [mono] Fix SuppressGCTransitionTest for Mono FullAOT mode #70490
    Future
  • [Wasm] AOT support for threading-enabled runtime #70489
    7.0.0
  • Consider having the register allocator be "clever" with SIMD callee save/restore #70488
    8.0.0
  • Emit creates a try catch method call exception #70487
  • [linux-arm64] Random and rare runtime crash System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException (System.Net.Sockets) #70486
  • [API Proposal]: Extend System.Environment.SpecialFolder to include newer common folders #70484
  • Optimize `Enum.GetUnderlyingType` with a known type to a constant #70483
    Future
  • Test `System.Tests.TimeZoneInfoTests.LocalTzIsNotUtc` is failing on Android #70482
    7.0.0
  • The WriteOnceBlock<T> behaves unexpectedly with AsObservable #70481
  • JIT: optRedundantBranches misses an opportunity #70480
    8.0.0
  • SerialPort.BytesToRead succeeds on disconnected serial port #70477
  • [Perf] Regressions in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Perf_AsyncMethods #70496
  • Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Plane #70497
  • [Perf] Changes at 6/2/2022 10:27:31 PM #70499
  • Regressions in System.Text.Tests.Perf_Encoding and Perf_Encoders #70501
  • [Perf] Regressions in Microsoft.Extensions.Primitives.StringSegmentBenchmark #70503
  • JSON source gen does not work correctly with nullable structs with custom converter #70475
    7.0.0
  • Test `System.Net.Security.Tests.SslStreamNetworkStreamTest.SslStream_UnifiedHello_Ok` is failing on windows #70470
    7.0.0
  • Test `CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback` is failing on Android #70469

Closed

  • Arm64 profile tooling support for performance analysis #70529
    7.0.0
  • Cannot extract shared runtime tar-ball with TarFile.ExtractToDirectory #70509
    7.0.0
  • Perf: JIT does not optimize pattern "~x + 1" #69003
    Future
  • [wasm] Linker failure breaking rolling builds #70363
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'm_dst->TypeGet() != TYP_STRUCT' with COMPlus_JitSkipArrayBoundCheck #61116
    8.0.0
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #43662
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/cmov/Float_Or_Op_cs_do/Float_Or_Op_cs_do.sh #70466
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add a new SizeUnit struct to the BCL to simplify byte math #70511
  • Codegen optimization of `(a << 4) | (b >> 4)` #69983
    Future
  • Fix testing of libraries projects in the vscode #34210
    Future
  • Build of libraries fails in VS #68716
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IsEmpty for Collections #70473
  • Invalid path length for use with domain sockets on iOS/tvOS platform #70468
  • methodical_others test failing/timing out on multiple runtimes, multiple OSes #70305
    7.0.0
  • Desktop: "System.Diagnostics.Tests.ActivityDateTimeTests.StartStopReturnsPreciseDuration" failed #21594
    Future
  • Unmanaged-managed call transition callback #45118
    Future
  • .NET 7 Preview 6, AOT Compilation fails on Android #70302
  • Extra package dependencies appearing for current framework. #52318
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [API Implementation]: Add `Order` and `OrderDescending` to `Enumerable` and `Queryable` #70525
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable IDE0020 (Use pattern matching) #70523
  • Enable IDE1005 (Delegate invocation can be simplified) #70522
    area-Meta
  • Delete `GTF_ASSERTION_PROP_LONG` #70521
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Add a 'wasm-gc-safepoints' option to enable the generati… #70520
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix documentation of BitDecrement #70519
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove narrow cast if the actual type sizes are the same #70518
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Added a new method to the GC API to Get the GC Configurations #70514
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Remove params byte[] from System.Net.Mail #70513
    area-System.Net
  • Remove unnecessary CA1052 suppressions #70512
    area-Meta
  • Mono Code Guidelines #70507
    documentation, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Enable IDE0028 (Use coalesce expression) #70506
    area-Meta
  • Fix default log color behavior when console is redirected #70504
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Enable IDE0036 (Modifers are not ordered) #70502
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Optimize expansion of indir cell addresses for CFG #70491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix failing LocalTzIsNotUtc test #70485
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [6.0] Modify thread pool thread counting to be a bit more defensive #70479
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 6.0.x
  • Avoid throwing Win32Exception from HTTP authentication #70474
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • make SslStream_UnifiedHello_Ok test conditional #70472
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono][wasm] Enable a subset of the gc_pin area optimizations. #70465
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • fixed a bug in DFA to NFA mode alternative branch generator #70464
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [wasm] Fail stable jobs if the tests fail, even for `runtime-staging` #70463
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • [release/6.0] JIT: Abandon loop search if we reach the end of the bbNext chain #69525
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.7
  • [Release/6.0] JIT: fix interaction of GDV and boxing (#60355) #69630
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.7
  • [release/6.0] Fix address adjustment in bundle unmap for macos universal binaries #69689
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.7
  • [Release/6.0] Fix singlefile bundle alignment on OSX ARM64 #69930
    Servicing-approved, area-Single-File, 6.0.7
  • [release/6.0] Host error message updates #70059
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.7
  • [release/6.0] OpenSslX509ChainProcessor: ignore NotSignatureValid on last element. #70343
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security, community-contribution, 6.0.7
  • Update analyzer version and fix new findings #70157
    area-Meta
  • Updating disabled tests' details with new tracking issues #70493
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Set `UnusedValue` correctly for the operands of `ARR_ADDR`/`BOX` #70498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Modify thread pool thread counting to be a bit more defensive #70478
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Modify tests to distinguish between emit- and interpreted-based invoke #70114
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • Enable IDE0110 (Remove unnecessary discard) #70500
    area-Meta
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Fix passing `shouldContinueOnError` through for the library tests #70494
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix Crossgen2 PDB generator #70407
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Unspecialize handle types after arithmetic ops in VN #70452
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Enable nullable for Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces #70454
  • [wasm][debugger] Added Default Interface Method static tests. #70138
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Dispose algorithm in SignatureSupport #70458
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Disable UnixDomainSocketTest.FilePathEquality test on tvOS and iOS #70471
    area-System.Net
  • remove extra GC.SuppressFinalize from SslStream #70467
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Enable IDE0074 (Use compound assignment) #70402
    area-Meta
  • [mono][llvm] Make calls from the cold cconv wrappers through the PLT. #70449
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove SAFEARRAY APIs from PAL #70462
    area-Interop-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove <Nullable>disable/annotations</Nullable> from test projects #70455
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Asynchronous thread suspension at GC safe points on Windows #70316
  • Bump intellisense version to Preview4 #70459
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Fix an assertion on x86+android. #70451
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono

Updated

  • [NativeAOT] prevent reentering CreateThreadLocalContentionCountObject #70456
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Do not add x86 host to PATH on 64-bit machines #70299
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-installer, 6.0.x
  • Add TarEntry conversion constructors #70325
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Make SString typed on encoding #69748
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][iOS] Grab the default timezone using native API #70288
    Servicing-approved, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.7
  • Introduce a source generator for invoking methods on unmanaged vtables #68276
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Detect inlining accurately and skip generating precode fixups for inlines that do not succeed #70379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Fix C4018 round I #70417
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Add infrastructure for building WebWorkers #70220
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Add support for per-project customization of helix work items #70461
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm][nodejs] Ensure that stdout/stderr have been flushed out before exiting #70416
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add xarch `blsmsk` #66561
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add disasm comments for field data addresses and code addresses #70437
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement UnixFileMode APIs #69980
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Move analyzer and fixer tests into FuncionalTests project #70406
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Update to use Mariner 2.0 as the build image #70111
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Do not propagate some constants #70378
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reenable C4244 in repo #70026
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • optimize BlockingCollection<T>.GetConsumingEnumerable iterator #69631
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Harden for null byrefs #70317
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • ARM64 - Always morph GT_MOD, and added optimization for `i % 2` #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add basic testing infrastructure in NativeAOT (port from dotnet/linker) #70408
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add markdown Readme for System.Text.Json #69015
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • List other architectures in dotnet --info #70403
    area-Host
  • Move a morph opt to post-order #69984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Optimize multi-dimensional array access #70271
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable HMAC on Browser WASM #70442
    arch-wasm, area-System.Security
  • JsonSerializer.DeserializeAsyncEnumerable should not wait until buffer is filled. #70430
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Fix ILGenerator maxstack computation #70388
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • align GC memory load calculation on Linux with Docker and Kubernetes #64128
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm]: JavaScript interop with [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes and Roslyn #66304
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Updating the various generic math functions to have default implementations #70445
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Convert exception help context parsing to managed #70251
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix for #70007, fallback to old implementation if optimized way fails #70073
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Use the CertificateAuthority store for finding intermediate certs in macOS #69277
    area-System.Security
  • Make ConnectWithRevocation_StapledOcsp more resilient to being slow #70413
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement System.Buffers.Text.Base64.DecodeFromUtf8 for Arm64 #70336
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #70224
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Avoid discarding upper bits when folding GT_SWITCH #69986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix long latencies in `ReaderWriterLockSlim` lock operations due to `Sleep(1)` #70165
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimization for full range checks (#70145) #70222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix usage of GSS_KRB5_CRED_NO_CI_FLAGS_X #70447
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [Wasm] Add support for baseUrl and mainScriptPath #70375
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Let low cost tree nodes reach CSE phase #70446
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Small MsQuicStream refactorings #70433
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add fake server test for Negotiate authentication. #70396
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Use ClrSafeInt everywhere and cleanup other same math declarations #70197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • CMake support in VS open folder for coreclr #70285
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Move macOS remote unwinding to libunwind directory #69720
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add event to capture min/max threads #70063
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-09
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Following steps for stand-alone experiment #1894
  • Update README.md #1893

Updated

  • New Readme #1895

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • C# Dictionary insertion speed could be improved (performance) #25946
  • wasm-tools emscripten has duplicated large libraries #25930
  • Log when PublishAot is enabled #25928

Closed

  • Unhandled System.IO.FileLoadException shows when dotnet format project #25879
  • Incorrect description when update dotnet tool with prerelease version #25486
  • dotnet workload restore fails when encountering solution folder #25592
    6.0.4xx
  • Microsoft.VisualStudio.TestTools.UnitTesting.StringAssert("{","x") throws System.FormatException #25373

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix copy&paste mistake in PublicSign preservation #25947
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Don't retarget testhost #25940
  • Support suppressions without a diagnostic id #25938
    Area-Compatibility
  • For build-from-source builds of .NET, opt-out of Microsoft telemetry #25935
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25933
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix typo in DefineStaticWebAssets.cs #25932
  • Getting Aot HelloWorld to be warning free #25927
    Area-ILLink

Merged

  • fix(cli): handle sln folders in workload restore command #25919
    Area-Workloads
  • Fix Description for Pre-Release Reinstallation Updates #25900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Static web assets] Fix pack when no assets exist #25939
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Update the RID target from lower Linux to the latest one #25909
    Area-Infrastructure

Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Nominal and Collection Deconstruction #4082

  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497

  • Champion "Extension function members" #192
    Backlog
  • Primary Constructors #2691

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Solution-level .editorconfig does not load EditorConfig UI #61803
  • Allow rename tracking and rename via light bulb (refactoring) to be disabled #61800
  • Question: How to use syntax trees efficiently. #61797
  • 'Introduce local' CodeAction in 'async Task' ArrowExpression adds invalid 'return' keyword to new method body #61796
  • Port few VB attribute unit tests to C# #61794

Closed

  • Renaming moves focus to a different editor, doesn't rename #61357
    17.3
  • Extract Interface not available on double clicking class name #59038
    17.3
  • Referencing Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Compilers causes dependency to netstandard.dll #61360
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • WIP: Support renaming symbols when the editor tries to fix a spell checking mistake. #61802
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61799
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix BuildActionTelemetryTable tool #61795
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Convert connection lost exceptions to cancellations to avoid overreporting NFE #61792
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Show rename flyout only on active view #61804
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Rename EA type for aspnetcore #61801
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix the project layout #61547
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge 'dotnet/main' into semi-auto-props #61798
    Area-Compilers
  • Add asp.net extensibility hooks for embedded language brace matching #61779
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61793
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Check 'scoped' differences in overrides and interface implementations #61738
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61791
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Revert "Add Move Static Member To Existing Type (#61519)" #61786
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Switch AsyncCompletion to new pooled CompletionItemList based APIs #61477
    Area-IDE, Needs Shiproom Approval
  • Add Document Outline Tool Window #61784
    Area-IDE
  • allow third party codfixers to be run in code cleanup #59631
    Area-IDE
  • Use inline rename session options for all checkboxes directly #61785
    Area-IDE
  • Unwrap the cause (inner exception) of operation canceled exceptions when reporting faults #61787
    Area-IDE
  • Fix lexing of the end of pp directives #61782
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust implementation of user-defined conversion resolution according to the latest LDM decision #61754
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Change ServiceHub host names #60778
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix VB compiler crashes when decoding attributes #61537
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Report an error for an implicit implementation of an inaccessible interface members #61717
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • Integrate generator times into /reportAnalyzer #61661
    Area-Compilers
  • Clarify semi-required properties #59047
    Area-IDE
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members without implementation as a type argument #61775
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #61758
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: single_query #42120
  • Blazor wasm native dependencies run-time crash in various C function signature configurations #42118
  • Latency during model binding #42116
  • For Blazor WebAssembly (hosted), consider enabling cross-origin isolation by default #42114
    7.0-rc1
  • user-jwts issues #42113
    7.0-preview6
  • AspNetCore.DataProtection deserialize a key file serialised (with nuget 5.0.x) using nuget 6.0.x lead to Invalid Payload exception #42111
  • Out of memory issue throws when rendering the 2040 * 2040 elements. #42108
  • Connection disconnected with error 'Error: Server returned handshake error: Handshake was canceled.;Server returned handshake error: Handshake was canceled.;No Connection with that ID: Status code '404' (anonymous) @ chat.js:36 Promise.catch (async) (anonymous) @ chat.js:35 #42107
  • Authentication needs in ASP.NET Core going forward #42105
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json #42104
  • Complex architecture using DI scoped service #42103
    Discussions
  • HTTP/2 WebSockets should not be limited by MaxRequestBodySize or MinRequestBodyDataRate #42101

Closed

  • F# asp.net 5.x app broken after migration to 6.x #41398
    Discussions
  • Add an AddOpenIdConnect extension that accepts generic TOptions : OpenIdConnectOptions #41811
    Discussions
  • user-jwts should just create the UserSecretsId if not found #41975
    7.0-preview6
  • ASP.NET Core templates that include both Open API and Authentication should include scaffolding for Swagger to authenticate users. #36185
    7.0-preview6
  • Blazor WASM standalone deployment - Publish Single Assembly File #42088
  • HttpClient for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Testing cannot access static files #42112
  • Razor Class Library isn't adding typescript output to static web assets #42110
  • Blazor Server-Side: Circuits/memory leak? #42106

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix branch name in mirror pipeline #42122
    tell-mode, 6.0.7
  • Fix branch name in mirror pipeline #42121
    area-infrastructure
  • Expose cookie extensions, consolidate cookie handling #42119
    area-security, area-runtime
  • Fix AddToGroupAsync race with OnDisconnectedAsync #42117
    area-signalr

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Define `$(HelixTestConfigurationFilePath)` #42031
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Fix line endings for SPA proxy script on MacOS #41821
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.7
  • [release/6.0] Backport Blazor boot config fix #41992
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Make tests for FileLoggerProcessor system time independent #42115
    area-runtime, tell-mode, 6.0.7
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8ded48c` to `548b13d` #41969
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.7
  • Clean up test retry list #42074
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • modify the route to display username and date #42099
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8ded48c` to `548b13d` #41968
    area-infrastructure, 3.1.27
  • [user-jwts] Read and generate secrets ID with SecretsManager #42006
    area-commandlinetools, area-web-frameworks, feature-userjwts, 7.0-preview6
  • Update branding to 2.1.36 #42094
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Added a new doc for adding projects to the repo #41949
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Updated Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers to latest stable #41115
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Update project templates to replace DateTime with DateOnly #42084
    area-mvc, area-blazor, feature-templates, 7.0-preview6
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    blocked, * NO MERGE *, area-web-frameworks
  • Add debugging of repeated config issues #42085
    investigate, area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *, 6.0.x
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Popup position isn't the same using Shell, NavigationPage or ContentPage #7912
  • [Android] Initial Layout of CollectionView Items on Device Tests is incorrect #7910
    6.0-sr2
  • DASH.js in BlazorWebView errors with 'MediaSource is not supported'. Works under Windows. #7909
  • Option to disable borders and underline (focus) #7906
  • [Blazor Hybrid] CSS Hot Reload changes get applied with a flicker on the UI #7905
  • DateTime.Now and DateTime.UtcNow.ToLocalTime() returns UTC time on IPhone and IPad #7903
  • requestLayout improperly called with a CollectionView #7902
  • Move Maui.Graphics into the main .NET MAUI repository #7901
    6.0-sr2
  • Mouse & Keyboard Input #7900
  • Shell Tab broken with dependency injection #7895
  • App Lifecycle event OnResume called more than once. #7894
  • GradientStop throws ArgumentOutOFRangeException on maccatalyst but works on windows #7889
  • [Android] RendererToHandlerShim found for Custom ShellRenderer is Incompatible #7888
  • Maui embedded issues: DisplayAlert not working and Application.Current is null #7887
  • [Android] Border Background not changed to Brush once we set the Gradient #7885
  • [Android] ContentViewHandler is incompatible #7884
  • Slider Disabled style is inconsistent #7882
  • Radiobutton custom content is not displaying on Android #7881
  • IJSRuntime and window.print() break MAUI Blazor App #7880
    .NET 7
  • OnNightModeChanged Android not functional #7877
  • Infinite Canvas #7876
  • UICollectionViewCompositionalLayout.GetLayout(config); always returns null #7874

Closed

  • ListView-nested VerticalStackLayout does not resize/expand to reveal unhidden children (IsVisible=true) #6448
    6.0-sr2
  • Unable to set app icon #7715
  • VerticalOptions FillAndExpand and Fill does not have any effect on the VerticalStackLayout and StackLayout #6694
    6.0-sr2
  • Row Height in Fill not working inside a ScrollView #6058
    6.0-sr2
  • FlexLayout Basis doesn't update live on Windows #3481
    6.0-sr2
  • MAUI + iOS: hit testing is very inaccurate #7870
  • Blazor MAUI integration err_addresss_invalid #7641
  • Resource.designer.cs of Android platform gets generated even after disabling #7896
  • VisualElement.Bounds's size does not match IView.Width/Height #4764
    6.0.300
  • The app styles does not react when theme changes #7730
  • [Android] MAUI Blazor - internal exceptions on startup (doesn't crash) #7454
  • MacCatalyst Bundle has "Windows" platform folder in Contents/Resources/Platforms instead of "MacCatalyst" folder #7866
  • Build and deploy slow #7716
  • The Windows BlazorWebView does not support HTTP (i.e. not HTTPS) #7875
  • [BUG] Have a few images in a repo but compiler fails with warning on Distinctfilenames which they are. #7871
  • ILifecycleBuilder #7843
  • Animation Sample Project #7838
  • Blazor MAUI Changing AppIcon and Splash screen seems trivial, fails to compile after making changes #7872

PullRequests

Created

  • Backport main to net7.0 #7908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • VisualTreeElement methods need to use DP vs PX #7904
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/ui-tools, 6.0-sr2
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Fix Alert on modal page #7898
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/modal, control-dialogalert
  • Bump Xamarin.Firebase.AppIndexing from 119.1.0 to 120.0.0.8 #7892
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.GooglePlayServices.Maps from 117.0.0 to 118.0.2.1 #7891
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Android.Glide from 4.12.0.8 to 4.13.2.1 #7890
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • [iOS] Fix exception using FlyoutBackgroundImage #7879
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, fatal

Merged

  • Fill ScrollView when content is smaller than viewport #7514
    area/layout 🔲
  • [xamlc] stop using pack:// with System.Uri in .NET 7 #7859
    area/Xaml </>
  • Bump Xamarin.AndroidX.MediaRouter from 1.3.0 to 1.3.0.1 #7847

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TPC query includes table that is not needed #28197
  • Cannot configure different Identity column facets for different tables in TPC mapping #28195
  • Property 'AutoGenerateBindingRedirects' is incorrectly set to true for some project types #28194
  • DbSet names are not used for table names in TPT and TPC mappings #28193
  • DbSet.FromSqlRaw produces error when executing stored procedure #28192

Closed

  • TPC queries fail when there is an abstract type in the middle of the hierarchy #28196
    7.0.0
  • EF Core 5 Table Valued Functions Unable to translate collection subquery in projection since the parent query doesn't project key columns of all Exception #23830
  • Better support for raw sql #28182
  • EF Core 6 - Unable to translate a collection subquery in a projection #28130

PullRequests

Merged

  • Query: Improve logic to find column names in TPC #28198
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Case sensitive parameters 18861 #26287
    waiting-for-response
  • Add entity-splitting model building support #28156
